comment: Love this professor! Super easy class for online. No discussions. And was quick to respond back to emails.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Respected

comment: Her class is a heavy reading-based. Her exams are extremely hard and the questions are worded similarly, so ig you cannot tell the difference, you would get the question wrong. There are no extra credits. The class is graded on 2 exams, and weekly quizzes. There is no room for error. If you do bad, it is hard to bring your grade up.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: She was a great professor that knew what she was teaching. Her exams are extremely hard but you can pass even if you do badly. Her course requires you to know the materials and the difference between the topics otherwise, her test questions will be hard. She will give extra credit for her test if she sees students struggle.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Honestly, the first week I was tempted to drop her class immediately. However, Professor Holland is by far one of the best professors I have had during my college career. There are no opportunities for extra credit and she doesn't grade attendance, but there are random in-class assignments. Read the book and pay attention in class; you'll be fine!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS ONLINE! The class is very dependent on the exams, you could pass all of the quizzes and ace the writing assignments but if you make anything less than a 70 on both exams do not look forward to passing the course. she is a very strict grader and does not give an extra credit at all.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: She's okay
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: I love professor Holland! I recommend her because she is well educated, caring, and confident in her teaching. The only grades we have are quizzes and exams. The text book is not necessarily needed unless you want it. Attendance is not required but she does in person assignments that cannot be made up... Take her class ;)
rating_tags: Caring--Respected--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Holland is a great professor that cares about her students! While attendance isn't mandatory, she does give graded in-class assignments on occasion. Her lectures are almost directly from the textbook, so i don't think purchasing the textbook is necessary. She also gives weekly quizzes and doesn't believe in cumulative end of course exams!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Dr. Holland is the best. She lets us use the textbook for the weekly quizzes and actually values learning rather than just memorizing. The exams are easy enough as long as you study for them, and the lectures are very interesting and interactive. She's a great professor.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Inspirational

comment: Great professor for research methods and knows what she's talking about. She does not post her lectures so going to class is recommended. She walks you through the research paper due at the end of the semester so as long as you turn in the two progress check you have the bulk of it done.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Amazing professor, very passionate about her work. Very helpful and kind.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Holland was a great professor! She is very clear on her grading on writing FOLLOW it, Respondus for 2 exams, quizzes are on Lockdown. Book required. She prepares you with excellent commentary; LISTEN, take NOTES on each module, READ, understand the DEFINITIONS and how each apply in each module; you will do great. I took her summer 4 week class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Holland is my new all time favorite professor. She is SO NICE, makes lectures super interesting, always lets us discuss issues/topics openly as a class and gives opposing viewpoints. Class is always so fun and interesting with her. Definitely had to study for the midterm and final but she prepares you for it well. 11/10 recommend PHolland
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Caring--Respected

comment: Super caring and always accessible outside of class. I took her online. Weekly quizzes - Lockdown. 2 writing assignments - easy & you choose what you do. Midterm and final - Lockdown & Webcam. Final is not cumulative. Everything for the semester is open so you can complete everything on your own time except tests. Not hard, just read your textbook
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Caring

comment: Dr. Hollands class was enjoyable except for the studying and having to read. She does use lockdown and good luck trying to use anything else.

She is a really helpful professor. If you need her she always emails back within a day. Throughout the semester there was a quiz a week. We had two exams and two writing assignments. It is all pretty straightforward. Quizzes were open book but the exam is not. If you can take her class do so!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Pretty easy class! She is easy to talk to, and very consistent. As long as you do the weekly assignments, its an easy A. Not difficult, but she is very willing to help.
rating_tags: Caring

comment: I took Dr. Holland for Crimes and Defenses online and she was amazing! Each week we read a chapter & had a lecture video to watch, a discussion board & then a quiz. There were only 2 tests, the midterm and final. The Final was not cumalitive. She wants her students to succeed and gives some of the best feedback! She's definitely one of my faves!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: Dr. Holland's class, while interesting, came with a huge workload. With a grade highly dependent on tests, there wasn't much wiggle room for students to get a good grade. There was a large amount of material to study for tests as well, making it difficult to review. Dr. Holland was a good teacher but struggled with online classes during COVID-19.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Be prepared to put in effort to achieve a good grade. I took her 4 week online course for summer so we did not have discussions instead we had two short essays. She gives great detailed feedback on papers. WATCH THE LECTURES THEY HELP A LOT!!! Uses lockdown browser for quizzes and exams.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy

comment: Stay to the course work and you will do fine, she responds to emails also
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Test heavy--Caring
